snippet: The Rail’s contributors welcome this year’s Preakness Stakes guest picker, Mayor Stephanie C. Rawlings-Blake, who became Baltimore’s 49th mayor in 2010.
abstract: The Rail’s contributors welcome this year’s Preakness Stakes guest picker, Mayor Stephanie C. Rawlings-Blake, who became Baltimore’s 49th mayor in 2010.

headline.main: No Politics, Just Our Preakness Picks
